com.fluidops.iwb.wiki
Class WikiH2SQLStorage

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.iwb.wiki.WikiStorage
      com.fluidops.iwb.wiki.WikiSQLStorageBase
          com.fluidops.iwb.wiki.WikiH2SQLStorage

public class WikiH2SQLStorage
extends WikiSQLStorageBase

WikiStorage for H2SQL database. Is used if Config.getStoreWikiInDatabase() is set in config.prop. See also WikiMySQLStorage for a MySQL variant (which is applied if in addition to above setting Config.getUseMySQL() is set.

Author:
as
